Package com.example.y.bookborrow_lendv2

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AllTest  
    B_request
    class defined as object in Request_Book_MyAdapter
    B_requestTest  
    book
    book object class contain all book related attributes setter and getter for the book info.
    bookAdapter
    book adapter used in MyBookList
    bookISBN
    DO NOT CHANGE ANY INTERFACES FOR THE GETTING AND SETTING UNLESS YOU ARE GOING TO COMPLETE THE CHANGES IN OTHER ACTIVITY This class is created for rating to the content of books marked with the same ISBN
    bookTests  
    BorrowBookList
    the books which a borrower is borrowing
    borrower
    borrower object class extends user class contain three ArrayList borrowedBook, requestedList and commentList
    BorrowerMenu
    main menu for user login as borrower, user has four option , requested book, booklist.
    BorrowerRequest
    Borrower Request activity when user login in as a borrower, there is a bookRequested button and this class be able to let user to view the book he/she requested, and the accepted books
    BorrowerRequestAdapter
    adapter class used for ListView in borrower -> request book list
    borrowerTest  
    BorrowingBookAdapter
    The type Borrowing book adapter.
    check_to_scan
    This function is working for scanning By scanning, user could check book details, borrow a book and return a book
    comment
    class defined as object in Request_Book_MyAdapter
    CommentAdapter
    list adapter for comment
    CommentDetail  
    commentTest  
    EditBookDetail
    This class is to provide an interface for owner to edit details of one of his book
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    home_page  
    lender
    lender object class extends user class contain two ArrayList borrowedBook and requestedList
    lenderTest  
    loginAct
    this is the first activity which allow user to register and loin
    MapsActivityBorrowerView  
    MapsActivityBorrowerViewTest  
    MapsActivityOwnerSetLocation
    Owner click location button from Private book detail, set location on map and return LatLng to PrivateBookDetail and send to fire base
    MyBookList
    this activity shows the books the user owns with different kinds of starus: requested, avaliable, borrowed and accepted
    NormalUser
    the class that extends user so that we can get an instance of user
    Notification Deprecated 
    OwnerHomeActivity
    The type Owner home activity.
    PersonDetail Deprecated 
    PrivateBookDetails
    This Class is to show all the detail of a book to the book owner Owner can delete ,edit and see request of the book, after owner accept the book owner can set location to show comfirm meeting address User can only see this activity from owner menu and press MyBookList
    profile
    User can only see this activity when he tries to edit book detail when he is checking his profile in SearchingDetailPage.
    PublicBookDetails
    This Class is to show all the detail of a book if the user want to know when the user is seeing other activity.
    RateToBorrower
    After a owner get his lended book back from scan activity, the owner will see this activity and be prompted to enter rate and comment for the borrower.
    RateToOwner
    After a borrower return his borrowed book back from scan activity, the borrower will see this activity and be prompted to enter rate and comment for the lender and the borrowed book.
    RatingAndComment
    DO NOT CHANGE ANY INTERFACES FOR THE GETTING AND SETTING UNLESS YOU ARE GOING TO COMPLETE THE CHANGES IN OTHER ACTIVITY This class is a container.
    RatingAndCommentTest  
    Register
    After the user press the sign up button from loginAct page, this page will be shown.
    Request_Book_MyAdapter
    The type Request book my adapter.
    RequestToOwner
    this class is a page allow borrower request book, books are displayed on listview
    Search
    This is our search pages that allow user to enter keyword For find the detail of user, and books
    SearchBookAdapter
    The type Search book adapter.
    SearchingUserDetail
    This class display user basic infor, the rate and commment the user recieved as a lender and the rate and comment the user recieved as a borrower.
    SearchPersonAdapter
    The type Search person adapter.
    SearchResultForBook
    This activity does the book search using keyword and shows the search results
    SearchResultForPeople Deprecated 
    SeeImageActivity
    User see an image here
    SignOutActivity Deprecated 
    user
    lender object abstract class contain all user related attributes setter and getter for the book info.
    userTest
    since user is an abstract class, we create another class "NormalUser" which extends user class and we are going to write unit tests for methods in NormalUser
    ViewAcceptedRequests  
    ViewRequests
    Owner views new requests in this activity
